question: Regional Rural Banks are designed to work in which one of the following ideals?
option1: Work on basics of Commercial Banks
option3: Keep lending rates lower than cooperative institutions
option4: Work on innovative and adaptive ideals
explanation: Regional Rural Banks are designed to help the targeted groups. Regional Rural Banks (RRBs) are Indian Scheduled Commercial Banks (Government Banks) operating at regional level in different States of India. They have been created with a view of serving primarily the rural areas of India with basic banking and financial services.
